title: [Sponsor] Stacker
content:
Build business apps without code: Stacker lets you create custom software that perfectly fits the way your business works.

Companies like Adobe, TED, Samsung and Mozilla use Stacker to create customer portals, collaboration tools and workflow apps.

Connect your existing data, from Airtable, Google Sheets or Salesforce, and get a working app in minutes. No coding required.

Sign up for a 30-day free trial today!

 ★
author: Daring Fireball Department of Commerce
